options.after_html:
<script type="text/javascript">
// This script copies the address from the Office Info form into the address field in this form
jQuery(document).ready(function($){
var oldValue = '';
var dynamic_field = document.getElementById("field_orlwa");
var hidden_field = document.getElementById("field_daojj");
var aTimer;
var counter;

$(dynamic_field).change(function(){
oldValue = $("#field_j2x8x").val() ;
if (!(aTimer == undefined) ) clearInterval(aTimer) ;
counter = 0 ;
aTimer = setInterval(function(){
var newValue = $("#field_j2x8x").val() ;
counter ++ ;
if ( (newValue != oldValue) ){
if (newValue != oldValue && newValue != undefined) {
hidden_field.value = newValue;
oldValue = newValue;
$(hidden_field).change();
}
clearInterval(aTimer) ;
}
} , 100) ;
}) ;
}) ;

</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
// Copies the office from the lookup field to the dynamic field. This allows us to keep the function of the dynamic field, but allow easier updating of the lookup via api
jQuery(document).ready(function ($) {
    $(document).on('change', 'select[name="item_meta[17944]"]', function () {
        var lookup_val = $(this).val();

        $("select[name='item_meta[4982]'] option").filter(function () {
            return $(this).text() === lookup_val;
        }).first().prop('selected', true).siblings().prop('selected', false);

        $("select[name='item_meta[4982]']").trigger({ type:'change', originalEvent:'custom' });
    });
});
</script>
